column2: "A new Matter Board has been formed. This is a result of following the path you were meant to take."
"From now on, you will see the truth, of both the past and the future."
"But you must not lose your focus. This is an ability that only you possess."
"For now, the only thing I can say is that I would like you to believe me."
"Hmm, ever since I came here... I became more aware of my movements."
"He is being particularly mindful of that broken weapon... That's just what I think but... Why was it broken in the first place...?"
"... Ah, sorry I digressed. Xion's goal appears to be the collection of that broken weapon's fragments."
"Moreover, that masked person seems to be looking for the same fragments. But you obstructed that person's plans. "
"Originally, that masked man would have died in the Tundra, but you have rewritten the fate of the fragments collected by the masked person by altering the future."
"What does that mean... At that point in time, only Xion would have known the answer."
"I wished she told me that story sooner. I wish she told me... Thatâ€™s right, that's no good."
"Even if she told you it would be useless, things regarding the future are things we can't be sure of... Something like that."
